alert.note: Alert for Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:06AM CDT until March 24 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Texas, including the following county, Knox. * WHEN...Until 300 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1206 AM CDT, Flooding due to heavy rain over the last several hours continues in the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Benjamin and Gilliland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
